title: Instructional Design Optimization Strategy Based on Dynamic Quality Attributes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic curriculum development concepts and understanding of adult learning theories
context.additional_context: Customized instructional design for enhancing science domain job competencies in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the balance between integration and differentiation in instructional design with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can design educational content structures into three types based on stability-flexibility requirements.
Learners can develop at least two blended learning activities applying the unity-diversity principle.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
